summary: Adds a follower named June to Sleeping Giant Inn
descriptionHtml:
My first mod so it's not great. Just adds a follower named June to the Sleeping Giant Inn. Any suggestions on how to make it better would be great! Please tell me of any bugs. She uses whatever body is installed for other NPCs. ApachiiSkyHair Female required

Armors used in screenshots:
Imperial Investigator Armor by Calyps: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19377/?
DreamBurrow's Investigator Armor Retexture: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22607/?
Kimono from Kankaraya mod by KANRA: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49292/?
Daughter of War by Severus616: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45530/?
Recolor of Daughter of War by evenstargw: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45662/?
author: Person896
